overview.en: Carefree Travel Mall is defined as the platform of leisure tourism whole industry chain mall, providing leisure tourism whole industry chain service for members in the form of clubs. The shopping mall platform adopts multi tenant shops, and the platform collects transaction service fees. Carefree Travel Mall plans the following sections: tourism services (tickets, guides, hotels, catering); RV camping services (accommodation, catering, RV parking, maintenance, repair, modification); customized tourism (company group construction, group tourism, personal recommendation of special tourist routes); vehicle operation services (RV sales, real estate). Rental, car custody; camp education (parent-child education, natural education, agricultural education, outward bound training); outdoor supplies (clothing, shoes, equipment); digital products (mobile phone communications, audio-visual entertainment, intelligent equipment, photography); food (leisure food, local specialties, tea, wine); automobiles (automobiles) Vehicle digital, auto parts, automobile accessories, vehicle services).
overview.zh: 畅游商城定义为休闲旅游全产业链商城平台，以俱乐部形式为会员提供休闲旅游全产业链服务。畅游链商城平台采用多租户商铺入住，平台收取交易服务费的模式。畅游商城计划下面板块：旅游服务（门票、导游、酒店、餐饮）；房车露营地服务（住宿、餐饮、房车停靠、保养、修理、改装）；定制旅游（公司团建、组团旅游、个人推荐特色旅游线路）；车辆运营服务（房车销售、房产租赁、房车托管）；营地教育（亲子教育、自然教育、农耕教育、拓展训练）；户外用品（衣服、鞋子、装备）；数码产品（手机通讯、影音娱乐、智能设备、摄影摄像）；食品（休闲食品、土特产、茶叶、酒）；汽车（汽车、车载数码、汽车配件、汽车饰品、车辆服务）等。
